titlePage.note: Contains translations of sagas into French with translated texts on recto leaves and notes on verso leaves.

msItem.title: Eiríks saga víðförla (French)
msItem.incipit: Þrándr est cité comme le premier roi
msItem.note: Note on fol. 1r reads: Fornaldar sögur Norðrlanda. Editin de Reykjavik 1889. Fols. 17r-18r contain: epilogue, list of names and list of placenames in two columns

msItem.title: Illuga saga Gríðarfóstra (French)
msItem.incipit: A reigné sur le Danmörk un ro nommé Skringr
msItem.note: Note on fol. 19r reads: Fornaldarsögur Norðrlanda. Tome III. Edition de Reykjavik 1889. Fols. 34r-35r contain: table of names and placenames. Fol. 35r: Note regarding the ship Gnoð and the Gnoðar with the date "12 septembre 1917"

msItem.title: Valla-Ljóts saga (French)
msItem.incipit: Il y avait un homme appelé Sigmundr
msItem.explicit: Et ici se termine cette saga.
msItem.note: Note on fol. 36r reads: Edition de Reykjavik 1898. Fol. 78r: chronolgy of the saga. Fols. 79r-81r: table of names and placenames. Fol. 81r: dated 1917.

msItem.title: Harðar saga (French)
Harðar saga ok Hólmverja
msItem.incipit: Ce fut aux jours de Haraldr enn hárfagri que se peuple
msItem.explicit: Maintenant nous mettons ici fin à la saga des Hólmverjar.
msItem.note: Note on fol. 82r reads: Edition de Þorleifr Jónsson, Reykjavik 1891. Fols. 196r-197r: chronology of the saga. Fols. 197r-206r: table of names and placenames. Fol. 206r: dated 1er octobre 1917.

msItem.title: Svarfdæla saga (French)
msItem.incipit: Le commencement de cette saga est que le roi Haraldr enn hárfagri
msItem.explicit: Et sur ces matériaux nous mettons ici fin à Svarfdoela saga
msItem.note: Note on fol. 207r: Edition de Reykjavik 1898. Fol. 325r: chronology of the saga. Fols. 326r-333r: table of names and placenames. Fols. 333r-335r: comments for a preface.

msItem.title: Gull-Þóris saga (French)
Þorskfirðinga saga
msItem.rubric: Þorskfirðinga saga dite aussi Gull-Þóris saga
msItem.incipit: Il y avait un homme appelé Þórólfr
msItem.explicit: Et nous mettons ici fin à la saga de Gull-Þórir.
msItem.note: Note on fol. 336r: Edition de Reykjavik 1897. Fol. 422r: chronology of the saga. Fols. 423r-432r: table of names and placenames

additions.p: Fol. 46v: drawing of a halberd in the comment section (Valla-Ljóts saga)

binding.p: Bound in contemporary paper with later laminate reinforcement
